page.title: 19A Day In My Life (2)
page.content: {Saturday 15th June:}I got up at 9 a.m. and had some 'Start' for breakfast, and then I went to{camp practice}with my friend, Rebecca. We had to put up a tent and a toilet tent, and then we had to make our bedding rack and sort out the wood for other gadgets. We then went home and I had a salad for lunch and got ready for my {disco-dancing}class. At 1 p.m. I went to catch the bus into town. First I went to Superdrug to buy some drinks for school dinner next week. At 2 p.m. I went to the disco class for an hour and then I went shopping and bought some stickers at'Upstairs Downstairs'. Later in the afternoon I met my Mum and we went to get a season ticket for {'Waterscene'}which is a large, outdoor pool with lots of different activities. In the evening I went to my friend Jill's birthday barbeque.
